description:
Course Update April 20, 2015

Join me as I show you simple tactics you can use to save hours of time and mental energy. I guarantee I can teach you these simple tactics in less than one hour of instruction!

You've likely been frustrated by the way unimportant and nuisance emails are mixed up with your important emails. The whole mess is exhausting just to look at. It's little wonder most people are completely overwhelmed by their email.

With our system, YOU really CAN get more done in an hour than most people do all day.

I wasted days of my life trying different organization systems and squandered hundreds of hours trying to operation WITHOUT. Then I FINALLY came up with a way to use my gmail account to keep EVERYTHING organized FLAWLESSLY!

Every day you tackle your email without a solid system, you are wasting precious hours of your life.

What's in the Course?

  • Learn to use GMAIL as a powerful organizational system
  • Learn to use GMAIL as a virtual assistant
  • Instructions on how to organize email intro structures that clearly define our work
  • Learn to capture all the data hurled at you each day into your GMAIL account
  • Understand the importance of organizing your email into meaningful contexts
  • Minimize the time it takes to sort email each day
  • Establish a follow up pattern so nothing slips through the cracks
  • Have confidence that we haven't forgotten anything.
  • Stop using the inbox as a todo list
  • Stop checking email compulsively (interrupting ourselves)
  • Switch to cloud based email (imap/gmail) instead of desktop based email

Course Requirements

A Gmail account and access to the internet

Who Should Take This Course?

  • Anyone who feels overwhelmed by all messages they have sitting in their inbox.
  • Anyone, young or old, from anywhere in the world, who uses email at work and/or home.
title: Time Management For Overworked Golfers
